title: Foundations of National External Debt Sustainability Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic economics and statistical concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Text/image-centric content for smartphone-based learners, strengthening practical skills through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain sustainability judgment criteria by analyzing external debt data from 22 middle-income countries.
Learners can demonstrate a process for evaluating national external debt risk levels using machine learning classification models.
Learners can propose external debt management strategies based on the correlation between exchange rate volatility and fiscal indicators.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
